metadata.title: Columbia Women's W Summerdry Cargo Short
features: OMNI-SHIELD: Go ahead, try and get dirty. Omni-Shield helps you stay clean and dry by resisting the absorption of liquids. Unlike most materials that absorb moisture, Omni-Shield repels moisture and dries quickly—avoiding stains and keeping you clean

OMNI-SHADE: Be safe and protected. Omni-Shade blocks UVA and UVB rays to help prevent sunburns and long-term skin damage. The tight weave construction with UV absorbent yarns block the full spectrum of harmful sun rays
GO ALL DAY: These quick-dry shorts are perfect for any active day, with a stretchy adjustable waist, built-in UPF 50 sun protection, and water-and-stain resistance
STASH AND SECURE: Handy PFG features include a partial elastic waist with an integrated belt, cargo pockets, hand pockets, and a  secure zippered back pocket

BUILT TO LAST: Columbia’s attention to detail is what sets our footwear apart. Specifying only the highest quality materials, expert stitching and craftsmanship. These are long-lasting shorts you will enjoy for seasons to come
description: A step above average cargo shorts, these feature quick-drying, water and stain repellent nylon, and built-in UPF 50 sun protection. An integrated belt and zip security pocket provide added utility. Whether you're out on the boat, at the dock, or just just hanging out on the beach, these summer shorts will not disappoint. Columbia offers these women’s cargo shorts in multiple colors, patterns, and sizes. Available in extended sizing. Regular Fit. To ensure the size you choose is just right, please refer to our sizing chart. To find your waist measurement, measure around your natural waistline.
